name: Scratching Post Simulator
description:
Scratching Post Simulator is a game that involves exploration, coordination, memory and skill. Jump to and from platforms in this immersive escape room where the aim is to find the secret tree to unlock the next room and ultimately be reunited with your lost kitty.

INSTRUCTIONS

Space bar : Jump

Arrow Keys to move

R to restart (end of game)

Credits
